channel.title: ftp server on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in ftp server on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Installing VsFTPd on Ubuntu Server
item.description: A small tutorial on how to install vsftpd and setup a separate user. Please follow these steps to install vsftpd service on your ubuntu machine. # adding a new local user useradd -g ubuntu ftpuser # change the password of the new user passwd ftpuser # checking the user information id ftpuser # checking the user group groups ftpuser # changing the group of the user usermod -g ubuntu ftpuser # installing and configuring vsftpd sudo apt-get install vsftpd sudo vim /etc/vsftpd.
